column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) in weighting T2 of a man of 37 years old, with sagittal section n°90 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The observed details include the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4239.8438 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 6126.4160 mm³, the temporal horn of left lateral ventricle of volume 11.8652 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 123.9258 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1364.5020 mm³ and the left hippocampus of volume 67.2363 mm³.
